heroes-app.title: Heroes App
heroes-app.description: Web application that allows searching and filtering comic book heroes using React for the user interface.

giphy-search.title: GIF Search with Giphy API
giphy-search.description: Web application that consumes the Giphy API to display animated images related to search terms, using React for the user interface and implementing caching techniques to improve performance and optimize API consumption.

todo-app.title: TODO app
todo-app.description: Web application for managing pending tasks, using JavaScript for the user interface.

blackjack.title: BlackJack
blackjack.description: Simple BlackJack game implemented in JavaScript, where the player can play against the computer following the classic rules of the game.
